allavelli.title: Allavelli
allavelli.subtitle: Web Development
allavelli.description:
Delivering legal excellence with clarity and precision.

fleder.title: Fleder
fleder.subtitle: App Development

Fleder delivers blood tests directly to your doorstep—fast, personalized, and barrier-free.

With streamlined tech and a network of trusted caregivers, every moment is built on safety, dignity, and empathy.
fleder.slogan:
Your health, delivered.
No lines, no wait.

Turning visions into reality,
where elegance meets home.

makuda.title: Makuda
